title: Empanadas-Dominicanas-Con-Zibas
instructions: Step 1. Place the flour, a pinch of salt and a tablespoon of oil and mix.
Step 2. Add the water little by little until you get a homogeneous mixture and let stand at least 20 minutes.
Step 3. Place the onion, tomato, pepper, garlic and fry in a pan, then add the meat.
Step 4. Add the carrot and olives, season with oregano, salt and pepper. Let cool and place the zibas.
Step 5. Stretch the previously prepared dough in a circle, place the filling and close in half to form the empanada.
Step 6. Place the oil in a pot and immerse the empanadas until they have a golden appearance.
Step 7. Serve and accompany with tomato sauce and chopped parsley.
